title: ambikAyAha abhayAmbikAyAha tavadAsOham
sahitya:
anupallavi

A:  shambarAri hari shashi kubEra pramukhOpAsita nava yOginyAha
sAnkhya tAraka manaskarAja yOginyAha shiva bhOginyAha
bimba pratibimba rUpiNyAha bindu maNDala vAsinyAha svarUpiNyAha


caraNam    yamaniya mAdyaSTAnga yOga viSayAdini graha karaNa
mUlAdhAra maNipUrakAdyabja bhEdana sphUrat-kuNDalinI
sahasradaLa brahma randhrastha kamalAntargata
shiva sammELana gaLita paramAmrta bindusEcana
samujrmbhita nADImukha vikAsakaraNa nijAnubhUti yOginyAha
amOghavara shiva sArUpyAnandAnubhava pradAyinyAha
apramEya guruguhAdi jananyAha brahmAdi pancaka kAriNyAha
